## MODEL\_FETCHER\_RETRY\_STRATEGY variable

Used to inject a custom retry strategy for http calls

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MODEL_FETCHER_RETRY_STRATEGY: InjectionToken<FetcherRetryStrategy>
```
